verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARG1: that the date and location for what will be a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization could be announced by the end of the week] .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for what [V: will] be a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization could be announced by the end of the week .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for [ARG1: what] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: be] [ARG2: a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization] could be announced by the end of the week .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for what will be a historic meeting between a [V: sitting] [ARG1: American president] and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization could be announced by the end of the week .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for what will be a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization [V: could] be announced by the end of the week .

WASHINGTON — President Donald Trump said Tuesday that the date and location for what will be a historic meeting between a sitting American president and the leader of North Korea over denuclearization could [V: be] announced by the end of the week .
